articles.title: ST apologises, says River Valley High School murder report and Axe Brand ad on front page an 'unfortunate juxtaposition' - AsiaOne
articles.description: The Straits Times has apologised for causing distress to the public after they voiced concern over an ill-timed advertisement published on the front page of its July 20 edition. A tragic incident shook the nation on Monday (July 19) as the alleged murder of a…
articles.content:
